pma:database.name: pos
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `bundles` ( `bundle_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `bundle_name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `bundle_type` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL, `bundle_menu_id` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bundle_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `codes` ( `code_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_value` int(4) NOT NULL, `code_name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `code_price` float DEFAULT NULL, `code_unique` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, PRIMARY KEY (`code_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=38 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `items` ( `item_id` int(2) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_id` int(4) NOT NULL, `item_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `item_type` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL, `item_img` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `item_price` float NOT NULL, `item_to_go_id` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`item_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=121 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT;

CREATE TABLE `orders` ( `order_id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `order_table` varchar(16) NOT NULL, `order_comment` text DEFAULT NULL, `order_time` varchar(16) NOT NULL, `order_status` varchar(16) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`order_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `order_bundles` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `order_id` int(8) NOT NULL, `bundle_id` int(8) NOT NULL, `bundle_comment` text DEFAULT NULL, `bundle_status` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `bundle_time` varchar(8) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `order_items` ( `order_item_id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `order_id` int(8) NOT NULL, `item_id` int(4) NOT NULL, `item_comment` text NOT NULL, `item_status` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `to_go_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `item_time` varchar(16) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`order_item_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `users` ( `user_id` int(2) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `user_password` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `user_role` varchar(16) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
